org.libav

Class DefaultMediaDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.DefaultMediaDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMediaDecoder

    public class DefaultMediaDecoder
extends Object
implements IMediaDecoder
    Default implementation of the media decoder interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DefaultMediaDecoder(IMediaReader mr) 
        DefaultMediaDecoder(String url)
      Create a new media decoder and open the media stream using the default media reader.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()

      Flush all underlaying decoders.

      • setVideoStreamDecodingEnabled

        public void setVideoStreamDecodingEnabled(int videoStreamIndex,
                                 boolean enabled)
                                   throws LibavException
        Description copied from interface: IMediaDecoder
        Enable or disable decoding of a video stream. The decoding is disabled by default for all video streams. You have to enable it at first if you want to get video frames.
        Specified by:
        setVideoStreamDecodingEnabled in interface IMediaDecoder
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        enabled - true to enable decoding, false to disable it
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the decoding cannot be enabled

      • isVideoStreamDecodingEnabled

        Check whether decoding of a video stream is enabled.
        Specified by:
        isVideoStreamDecodingEnabled in interface IMediaDecoder
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        Returns:
        true if it is enabled, false otherwise
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the decoding state cannot be checked
